title: Rajasi Ruby Bead Haaram with Polki Diamond Pendant
features: This exquisite Haaram features five strands of vibrant ruby beads held together by intricately crafted gold elephant motifs adorned with Polki diamonds and small emerald beads. The pendant is a masterpiece of Polki diamond setting, arranged in a floral design around a striking oval cabochon emerald. The pendant base features two gold peacocks facing each other. Ruby and pearl drops add a touch of whimsy. The piece showcases a traditional closed setting typical of antique Polki jewelry.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for high-end social events and milestone celebrations.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The Polki diamonds, with their unique uncut charm, create a regal look. The ruby beads symbolize prosperity and passion, while the emerald signifies good health and fortune. The entire piece represents a harmonious blend of tradition, luxury, and auspicious symbolism. It is a valuable addition to any heirloom collection.
